summary: A lore friendly companion with an ancient and mysterious past.
descriptionHtml:
The perfect companion. Assassin style follower, suitable for all levels and has an in depth and sad lore story to tell all laid out in a full length book. He can be found by the horse carriage outside Whiterun. I am currently adding voice files to him but \'till then he has to make do with a dark elf voice. He\'s archer and swordsman and the second vampire in all of Tamriel\'s history, the first to be infected by a bite and one of the first Dragonborns\'. His life is a tragic lament, and he will forever be lonely. 

Please comment so I can improve it.
author: Lord William
